title: Capital District and Berkshires Eats
name: Capital District and Berkshires Eats
description:
A Map by Keltiwoman

Restaraunts around Berkshire County, Massachusetts and the Capital District and Hudson Valley in NY

properties.name: Bizen
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 17 Railroad Street, Great Barrington, MAWonderful Japanese restaurant and Sushi bar. Food is excellent and staff are very nice.

properties.name: David's Fine Foods
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 360 Northern Blvd Albany, NY Never been that impressed with the service (I don\'t think they smile much here) but the tarragon chicken salad and the cookies are real good (especially the peanut butter dipped in chocolate and the meltaways).

properties.name: El Loco
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 465 Madison Ave., Albany NYReally cool atmosphere and the staff are always great. And so is the food. I\'ve been coming here for about 20 years I think and it\'s still one of my favorites. Good vegetarian and vegan items, too. Try the flan or the bananachanga for desert. ***** on my list.

properties.name: Helsinki Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman  284 Main St. Great Barrington, MAThis is a cool little restaurant that serves great mostly northern European dishes. They have a great tea and desert menu, too. No real kids menu, but my 8 year old daughter thought it was cool enough to want to go back. Come for dinner and stay for a show next door at Club Helsinki.

properties.name: Ichiban Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by System  338 Central Ave # 338, Albany, NYIchiban Restaurant (518) 432-0358

properties.name: Juice n' Java
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman  216 Elm St., Pittsfield, MAReally good coffee. Soup is pretty good, too. Nice place to meet with friends for a cup of coffee or to meet up with someone before heading out.

properties.name: Over the Rainbow
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 109 First St., Pittsfield, MANot quite NYC-style pizza but not bad, either.

properties.name: Patricks Pub and Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 26 Bank Row, Pittsfield, MAGreat wings, good beer. Good kids menu. Not always the fastest service but usually pretty good.

properties.name: Perfect Blend
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman  376 Delaware Avenue, Delmar NYGood coffee and a great place to meet up with people. Parking is in back off Kenwood.

properties.name: Siam Square
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 290 Main St, Great Barrington, MAGood Thai food - very friendly

properties.name: The Village Oven
properties.description: Posted by Keltiwoman 30 Main St., West Stockbridge, MAReally good pizza and cannolis
